short_summary: Bulk Propane needs to be delivered in Montebello, QC
description: Bulk Propane including activity, installation, Rentals and delivery, Parks Canada Agency, Mauricie and Western Quebec Field Unit
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### RFP: Bulk Propane Acquisition for Parks Canada Agency

**Notice Information**

| **Item** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS4314133687-Doc4314163170 |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |
| **Publication Date** | November 17, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | December 7, 2023, 14:00:00 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal (RFP) |

**Commercial Information**

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Commercial Documents**

* **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18041870?extsite=MTgwNDE4NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Project Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Parks Canada Agency
	+ Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3, Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name**: Alina Cocieru
* **Contact Email**: <alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Project Description**

The Parks Canada Agency is seeking a supplier to provide bulk propane, including delivery to Montebello (QC) as and when needed, as well as installation and rental with maintenance of 2 (two) 1000-gallon tanks. The requirements are detailed in the solicitation.

**Notice Type and Procurement Question**

This is an open bidding procurement, with the lowest price being the selection criteria. The contract will be awarded to the bid that best meets the selection criteria listed in the solicitation.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is available to suppliers who are certified under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity**

None

**Regions of Delivery**

Quebec (except National Capital Region)

Please review the procurement opportunity for complete details, including the solicitation documents and
